CustomField.description: Used in OBGYN Workflow to determine one day after completion.
CustomField.formula: if( AND ( text(About_Your_Family_Status__c) = "Completed", text(Your_Health_Care_Team_Status__c) = "Completed", About_Your_Family_Status_Timestamp__c > Your_Health_Care_Team_Status_Timestamp__c) , DATEVALUE(About_Your_Family_Status_Timestamp__c), if( AND ( text(About_Your_Family_Status__c) = "Completed", text(Your_Health_Care_Team_Status__c) = "Completed", About_Your_Family_Status_Timestamp__c < Your_Health_Care_Team_Status_Timestamp__c) , DATEVALUE(Your_Health_Care_Team_Status_Timestamp__c), null))
CustomField.label: Date for OBGYN Trigger
